column4: mine issue is simple: 1) i need to unplug/plug my usb headphones, 2) i need to run asoundconf-gtk and select headphones and 3) everyone should solve mine problem as a priority. I mean, is that really to much to ask... :)
Or do I need to join the queue of people who want their problem solved as a priority?
I can't hear you, it must be my usb headphones
your number 1 problem is using the word "mine" where you should be using "my"  :P
